reviews.text:
Nothing like a fancy glizzy! That's pretty much it...

Pros:
- SO MANY OPTIONS! and they're totally willing to customize different options
- Root beer float...
Fun, and interesting decor. Great lunch place. We were told that it would be about a 30 minute wait and it was about 10. Great selection of hotdogs. Very...
This place is awesome! It was recommended via group shouting at a live podcast recording I was attending nearby, and I figure if that many folks were keen...
